title: How to Remove Tough Strings from Celery

steps.headline: Make a small cut at the base of the stalk.
steps.description: This cut should be about 3cm/1.1" in length.

steps.headline: Use a sharp knife to pull the strings down towards the cut.
steps.description: When the strings reach the cut, the will lift automatically.

steps.headline: Try an alternative method.
steps.description: If preferred, you can use a vegetable peeler and lightly peel off the strings.

text: Make a small cut at the base of the stalk. This cut should be about 3cm/1.1" in length. Use a sharp knife to pull the strings down towards the cut. When the strings reach the cut, the will lift automatically. Try an alternative method. If preferred, you can use a vegetable peeler and lightly peel off the strings.
sentences: Make a small cut at the base of the stalk.
This cut should be about 3cm/1.1" in length.
Use a sharp knife to pull the strings down towards the cut.
When the strings reach the cut, the will lift automatically.
If preferred, you can use a vegetable peeler and lightly peel off the strings.
